channel.title: Mail on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Mail on Arrans github.io

item.title: stalwartlabs/stalwart
item.description: All-in-one Mail & Collaboration server. Secure, scalable and fluent in every protocol (IMAP, JMAP, SMTP, CalDAV, CardDAV, WebDAV).

item.title: emersion/go-smtp
item.description: 📤 An SMTP library for Go clients and servers

item.title: forwardemail/forwardemail.net
item.description: Privacy-focused encrypted email for everyone. All-in-one alternative to Gmail + Mailchimp + Sendgrid.

item.title: markushinz/aws-ses-pop3-server
item.description: The missing POP3 💌 server for Amazon Simple Email Service - written in golang.

item.title: inbucket/inbucket
item.description: Disposable webmail server (similar to Mailinator) with built in SMTP, POP3, RESTful servers; no DB required.

item.title: Foundry376/Mailspring
item.description: 💌 A beautiful, fast and fully open source mail client for Mac, Windows and Linux.

item.title: wneessen/go-mail
item.description: 📧 Easy to use, yet comprehensive library for sending mails with Go

item.title: jhillyerd/enmime
item.description: MIME mail encoding and decoding package for Go

item.title: Enough-Software/enough_mail_app
item.description: Mail app for iOS, Android and hopefully more platforms in the future. Based on Flutter.

item.title: emersion/go-imap
item.description: 📥 An IMAP library for Go clients and servers

item.title: emersion/go-message
item.description: ✉️ A streaming Go library for the Internet Message Format and mail messages
